name: Dedenne
author: MAHOU
flavor_text: It uses its tail to absorb electricity from power plants or from outlets in houses, and then it fires the electricity from its whiskers.

attacks.name: Nuzzle
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent’s Active Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Nuzzle Shot
attacks.effect: This attack does 10 damage for each of your Pokémon in play that has the Nuzzle attack to 1 of your opponent’s Benched Pokémon. (Don’t apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)
